summary: 'TAKATA RECALL' I WAS DRIVING TO A FRIENDS HOUSE AND AS I WAS PULLING IN THEIR DRIVEWAY TO PARK. I PUSH MY GEAR TO PARK BUT MY CAR GOES IN REVERSE GEAR WHEN I PUT IT IN TO PARK GEAR AND SO I TRIED TO MOVE MY GEAR SHIFT TO THE GEAR I WANTED BUT IT WOULDN'T MOVE ANY MORE. SO I CUT MY CAR OFF AND WHEN I CUT IT OFF IT KEPT ROLLING FORWARD SO I JUST PULLED MY EMERGENCY BRAKE AND LEFT IT AS IS.
